summary: 2010 DUTCHMEN LITE TRAVEL TRAILER I BROUGHT NEW SEPT 27 2010 FROM CAMPING WORLD FORT MYERS FL. SLIDE OUT WON'T STAY CLOSE WHILE IN TRANSIT AT TIMES OPENING AS MUCH AS 6 INCHES. OTHER DRIVERS ARE CONSTANTLY WARNING ME THAT I HAVE A PROBLEM. CAMPING WORLD REPLACED THE ENTIRE SLIDE ONCE BUT IT HAD NO EFFECT. I HAD NUMEROUS OTHER PROBLEMS SOME THEY REPAIRED BUT THEY RAN OUT THE CLOCK ON THE ONE YEAR WARRANTY AND THEY AND DUTCHMEN REFUSED TO DO ANY MORE TO FIX PROBLEMS. I'M CONCERNED IT MAY CAUSE A SERIOUS ACCIDENT. TRIED TO CONTACT DUTCHMEN 3 TIMES GOT ANSWERING MACHINE NEVER GOT CALL BACK. AUG 1 2011 I SPOKE TO SALES MANGER  BOB HAMMEL  AND ASKED HIM TO LOOK AT THE PROBLEMS WITH ME. HE LAUGHED AND WALKED AWAY FROM ME.  *TR
